topic.title: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE PREVIOUSLY UNASSESSED PERIODS OF CARE CLAIMS (YEAR TO DATE)
topic.shortdesc: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE PREVIOUSLY UNASSESSED PERIODS OF CARE CLAIMS (YEAR TO DATE) is the total number of Previously Unassessed Periods of Care (PUPoC) claims agreed eligible for NHS Continuing Healthcare in the most recent financial year up to the end of the current REPORTING PERIOD.
